room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape The Post in Detroit
review: My first experience with an Escape Room and I loved it. You guys did a great job, our Zombie Doctor was great. I will definitely be bringing more people here with me.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape The Post in Detroit
review: We had a great time in the Zombie Apocalypse room! I am looking forward to coming back to do another room soon.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape The Post in Detroit
review: We did the zombie room. I laughed until I hurt. The staff are awesome, the zombie was incredibly helpful. We're already planning our return trip. Can't wait to experience the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape The Post in Detroit
review: So much fun! The Zombie Apocalypse was amazing and the Zombie was completely committed to his character. He made the room even more interactive!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Escape The Post in Detroit
review: This place is awesome! The staff was hilarious and friendly from start to finish. They definitely make sure the experience is amazing! We didn't find the serum to save the poor zombie - we were so close! I'd also like to add that the zombie was perfect and way too real. He had me laughing so hard and never ever broke character. I highly recommend this place!
